title: [LFT] silver 2 currently, want a semi-serious team to have fun with. any role
body:
can play any role well, however jungle and adc are my strongest roles
add me in-game and message me or comment below.

replies.body: Used to be silver main support, if you need a support role.

happy to make a team with you if you dont find one
IGN: knuuckles
sounds good I have sent u a friend request
